statements: SELECT * FROM energy_impacts;
SELECT energy_source, carbon_footprint, water_usage FROM energy_impacts;
SELECT id, energy_source FROM energy_impacts WHERE carbon_footprint > 10;
SELECT * FROM energy_impacts WHERE land_impact < 5;
SELECT energy_source, water_usage FROM energy_impacts WHERE carbon_footprint BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM energy_impacts WHERE carbon_footprint > 100 ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, energy_source FROM energy_impacts WHERE water_usage < 50 ORDER BY water_usage ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM energy_impacts WHERE land_impact BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY energy_source ASC, carbon_footprint DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT energy_source, SUM(carbon_footprint) AS total_carbon_footprint FROM energy_impacts GROUP BY energy_source HAVING SUM(carbon_footprint) > 500 ORDER BY total_carbon_footprint DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT energy_source, AVG(water_usage) AS average_water_usage FROM energy_impacts GROUP BY energy_source HAVING AVG(water_usage) < 75 ORDER BY average_water_usage ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Environmental_Impacts;
SELECT energy_source, emissions_level FROM Environmental_Impacts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Energy_Production_Methods ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT method_name, carbon_capture FROM Energy_Production_Methods WHERE efficiency >= 0.5;
SELECT id, energy_source, water_usage FROM Environmental_Impacts WHERE emissions_level < 50;
SELECT * FROM Environmental_Impacts WHERE emissions_level > 50 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT energy_source, SUM(emissions_level) AS total_emissions FROM Environmental_Impacts GROUP BY energy_source HAVING total_emissions > 500;
SELECT id, method_name, efficiency FROM Energy_Production_Methods WHERE efficiency > 0.75 AND carbon_capture = TRUE ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT energy_source, AVG(water_usage) AS avg_water_usage FROM Environmental_Impacts GROUP BY energy_source HAVING avg_water_usage < 100;

SELECT * FROM Environmental_Impacts JOIN Energy_Production_Methods ON Environmental_Impacts.energy_source = Energy_Production_Methods.method_name WHERE Environmental_Impacts.emissions_level < 50 AND Energy_Production_Methods.efficiency > 0.8 ORDER BY Energy_Production_Methods.efficiency DESC;
SELECT * FROM bioenergy_impact WHERE carbon_emissions < 500.00;
SELECT production_method, energy_output FROM bioenergy_impact WHERE energy_output > 1000.00;
SELECT id, method_name FROM production_methods WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM environmental_factors WHERE impact_rating >= 3;
SELECT factor_name, impact_rating FROM environmental_factors WHERE factor_name LIKE '%land%';
SELECT production_method, energy_output FROM bioenergy_impact WHERE carbon_emissions > 100 ORDER BY energy_output DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM production_methods WHERE method_name LIKE 'Bio%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT factor_name, impact_rating FROM environmental_factors WHERE impact_rating >= 3 ORDER BY impact_rating DESC, factor_name ASC;
SELECT pi.id, pm.method_name, pi.energy_output FROM bioenergy_impact pi JOIN production_methods pm ON pi.production_method = pm.method_name ORDER BY pi.energy_output DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM bioenergy_impact WHERE production_method = 'Solar' AND carbon_emissions < 50 ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM EnergySources;
SELECT source_name, carbon_intensity FROM EnergySources;
SELECT * FROM ProductionMethods WHERE method_name = 'Solar Power';
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalImpact ORDER BY impact_type DESC;

SELECT source_name, impact_type FROM EnergySources INNER JOIN EnergyProduction ON EnergySources.source_id = EnergyProduction.source_id INNER JOIN EnvironmentalImpact ON EnergyProduction.impact_id = EnvironmentalImpact.impact_id;
SELECT * FROM EnergySources WHERE carbon_intensity > 0.5 ORDER BY source_name DESC
SELECT source_name, source_description FROM EnergySources WHERE source_name LIKE 'Solar%'
SELECT method_name, method_description FROM ProductionMethods WHERE method_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY method_name
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalImpact ORDER BY impact_type ASC, impact_id DESC
SELECT production_id, production_date, production_quantity FROM EnergyProduction WHERE production_quantity >= 100 ORDER BY production_date ASC
SELECT * FROM environmental_impacts;
SELECT impact_name, impact_description FROM environmental_impacts;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM energy_sources WHERE source_type = 'Renewable';
SELECT production_name, production_description FROM energy_production ORDER BY production_name DESC;
SELECT measurement_value, measurement_date FROM impact_measurements WHERE measurement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM environmental_impacts;
SELECT impact_name, impact_description FROM environmental_impacts WHERE impact_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM energy_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT production_name, impact_name FROM energy_production INNER JOIN environmental_impacts ON energy_production.impact_id = environmental_impacts.impact_id;
SELECT * FROM impact_measurements WHERE measurement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
